message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I know it's a valuable asset, and I'm confident it will be worth even more to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $950,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value your interest, I'm not quite ready to come down that far.  I'm willing to go to $1,050,000. Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and I am willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000.
